title: How Many Calories in 20 McNuggets?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 20 mcnuggets from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Chicken McNuggets, breaded and fried; no dipping sauce or sides included; based on U.S. menu values.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and preparation; always check McDonald's app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: 20 Chicken McNuggets provide about 900 calories and 42 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 packet barbecue sauce per 5 nuggets
With spicy buffalo sauce (1 packet total)

faqs.q: How many calories per single McNugget?

faqs.a: Approximately 42 g of protein from 20 chicken mcnuggets.
Yes, 20 mcnuggets have around 2,000 mg sodium—nearly a full day's worth.
Typically 0 g trans fat per serving, but check current recipes.

faqs.q: How does sauce affect calories in 20 mcnuggets?
faqs.a: One sauce packet adds 50–110 calories depending on type; skip for lower totals.
